pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quality control and reliability // This package allows to generate Shewhart-type charts and to obtain numerical results of interest to the quality control of a process (involving continuous, attribute or count data). This package provides basic functionality for univariable and multivariable quality control analysis, including: xbar, xbar-one, S, R, ewna, cusum, mewna, mcusum and T2 charts.
